text: Solomoni adamwetulira posangalatsidwa ndi mawu ake ndipo iye adati, “Ndilangizeni Ambuye kuti ndizikuthokozani pa zabwino zonse zimene mwandipatsa ine ndi makolo anga ndiponso kuti ndizichita ntchito zabwino zimene zimakukondweretsani inu. Ndilowetseni ine ku Paradiso kudzera m’chisomo chanu, kuti ndikhale pakati pa akapolo anu angwiro.”
